= Magnetic Force and Field =

== The Magnetic Force ==

*Permeability constant*
{{$
  \mu_0 = 4\pi \cdot 10^{-7}~\mathrm{N \cdot s^2 \cdot C^{-2}} = 1.26 \cdot 10^{-6} ~\mathrm{N \cdot s^2 \cdot C^{-2}}
}}$

*Magnetic force; Charge moving parallel to current*
{{$
  F = -\frac{\mu_0}{2\pi} \frac{qvI}{r}
}}$
in the radial direction

== The Magnetic Field ==

{{$
  F = q\vec{v} \times \vec{B}
}}$
